name: School Trip (itch)
description: You and your friends are plunged into a seemingly altered universe after Corina's Comet passed dangerously close to Earth In the early morning. Ambushed on your way to school, now the gang must survive for as long as they can. Utilize each Character's strength's and balance their weaknesses to survive and rack up your score. If anyone in the gang goes down it's Game Over!
